name: Fall of Gyes
description: The Fall of Gyes is a sci-fi visual novel from After Reset™ series with stunning cinematic quality and an intriguing story inspired by classic sci-fi horror films of Ridley Scott. If you like The Thing, Aliens or Prometheus movies with a claustrophobic atmosphere where no one knows exactly what is happening or who the enemy is until disaster strikes - then our kinetic novel is right for you.
